name: In re Nomination Paper of Steven PORTER as Candidate of an Independent Political Body for United States Congress for the 3rd District in the General Election of November 4, 2008. Appeal of Steven Porter
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Paper of Porter

parties: In re Nomination Paper of Steven PORTER as Candidate of an Independent Political Body for United States Congress for the 3rd District in the General Election of November 4, 2008. Appeal of Steven Porter.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 17th day of October, 2008, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 232
In re Nomination Paper of Steven PORTER as Candidate of an Independent Political Body for United States Congress for the 3rd District in the General Election of November 4, 2008. Appeal of Steven Porter.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 17, 2008.
